announcements.title: Welcome to St. Patrick's Catholic Church
announcements.message: We welcome all parishioners and visitors to our parish. Join us for Mass and fellowship.

announcements.title: Weekly Mass Schedule
announcements.message: Daily Mass: Monday-Friday at 6:30 AM. Sunday Mass: 6:30 AM and 9:30 AM. Children's Mass: Sunday 9:30 AM. St. Jude Mass Centre, Ashipa: Sunday 6:30 AM. All are welcome!

announcements.title: Parish Office Hours
announcements.message: The parish office is open Monday, Tuesday, and Friday from 9:00 AM to 4:00 PM. Wednesday from 8:00 AM to 12:00 PM. For urgent matters, please call +234 802 344 4069.
